scripts.icongen: cd API && node -r esm design-system-functions.js && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-css-generator.js
scripts.neo-update-site: cd API && node -r esm design-system-functions.js && node -r esm server.js && npx icon-font-generator ../properties/assets/icons/svgs/*.svg -o ../properties/ --name 'neo-icon-font' --types 'woff' -c false --html false --json false --normalize true --height 1000 && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-css-generator.js && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-file-replacer.js && cd .. && node -r esm styleDicExt.js && node -r esm neo-icon-combine.js && node-sass neo/scss-update/main.scss ../Avaya_Design_Portal_proto/src/global_styles/neo.css
scripts.icongen-manual: cd API && npx icon-font-generator ../properties/assets/icons/svgs/*.svg -o ../properties/ --name 'neo-icon-font' --types 'woff' -c false --html false --json false --normalize true --height 1000 && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-css-generator.js && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-file-replacer.js
scripts.neo-update: cd API && node -r esm design-system-functions.js && node -r esm server.js && npx icon-font-generator ../properties/assets/icons/svgs/*.svg -o ../properties/ --name 'neo-icon-font' --types 'woff' -c false --html false --json false --normalize true --height 1000 && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-css-generator.js && node -r esm ./icons-functions/icon-file-replacer.js && cd .. && node -r esm styleDicExt.js && node -r esm neo-icon-combine.js && node-sass neo/scss-update/main.scss neo/dist/3.10.0/neo.css
scripts.x-icongen: npx icon-font-generator x-icons/svgs/*.svg -o x-icons/ --name 'x-icon-font' --types 'woff' -c false --html false --json false --normalize true --height 1000
